name: Hakkorhn Smashlord
aura: Increase Ally HP in Dungeons by 33

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 40% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn.
skills.name: Inhuman Force
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc: Removes all debuffs from all allies, then places a [Block Debuffs] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Heals all allies by 15% of this Champion's HP. Heals each ally by an extra 10% of this Champion's MAX HP for each debuff removed from them.
skills.name: Rallying Bellow
skills.books:
Lvl. 2  Heal +5%
Lvl. 3  Heal +5%
Lvl. 4  Heal +5%
Lvl. 5  Heal +5%

skills.desc:
Sacrifices HP equal to 25% of this Champion's MAX HP, then attacks all enemies. Damage inflicted is equal to 50% of this Champion's MAX HP. This attack is always a normal hit. 

The HP sacrifice will happen even if it kills this Champion.
skills.name: Blood Offering
